list.description_pre_prod: Let's plan everything in front: script, schedule and logistics or even catering
list.description_prod: Production crew, assistance and directing during the shoot for stunning results
list.description_post_prod: Leave your content to professionals. We are capable of editing, creating graphics, motion elements and sound-design

atelier.heading:
atelier
for you
atelier.subheading: space with all the tools you need to create content
atelier.description: From pre-production and planning to post-production and editing, we'll work closely with you to ensure that every aspect of your project is executed to perfection. With experienced director on hand, you can rest assured that you'll receive the guidance and support you need to create high-quality content that truly stands out

voucher.heading: discount voucher
voucher.email_description: Choose any service and let us be your external production service

services.heading: services
services.video_prod_description: Interview, Social Media Content, TV and Digital Spot, Content with Experts, Corporate and Fashion Content
services.streaming_description: Let us support your event with outstanding streaming service. High-speed Internet with Director on board
services.photography_description: Static Content for WebPage, Print Campaign or Social Media
services.atelier_description: Ateliers is equipped with a variety of lighting and camera equipment, backdrops, and props to support the creative process.
